channel.title: Tip on Math2001's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tip on Math2001's blog

item.title: The Last Terminal Title
item.description: I use tmux, and in the tabs, it displays the terminal’s title, which is just done by this 2 lines in your .tmux.conf: setw -g window-status-current-format ' #{pane_title} ' setw -g window-status-format ' #{pane_title} ' What should you display in the tabs in your opinion? For me, it’s obvious: the last command that I ran, and the location. Now, we can’t display the whole path, but just the current folder name does perfectly the job.
